attributes.title: Way to slow!!!
attributes.review: The app took almost an entire day to download. It also takes up a ridiculous amount of space. The app also is constantly running in the background to track you. Once opened nothing would load due to the gps overload. This app is dangerous and lets anyone know your location with just a few passwords. Stay clear of this app for sure.

attributes.title: APP CAUSED MY PHONE TO BREAK
attributes.review: before downloading this app my phone was functioning normally but after about an hour (with minimal usage beyond putting in my phone number) it started lagging and glitching. It will also occasionally freeze on the opening page of the app and then not allow me to close it or turn my screen off until I force my phone to shut down. please remove this.
